[fusion_builder_container hundred_percent="no" hundred_percent_height="no" hundred_percent_height_scroll="no" hundred_percent_height_center_content="yes" equal_height_columns="no" menu_anchor="" hide_on_mobile="no" status="published" publish_date="" class="" id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" background_repeat="no-repeat" fade="no" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" video_mp4="" video_webm="" video_ogv="" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_loop="yes" video_mute="yes" video_preview_image="" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="0px" padding_top="0px" padding_right="0px" padding_bottom="0px" padding_left="0px"][fusion_builder_row][fusion_builder_column type="1_1" type="1_1" layout="1_1" spacing="yes" center_content="no" link="" target="_self" min_height="" hide_on_mobile="no" class="" id="" background_image_id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" undefined="" background_repeat="no-repeat" hover_type="none" border_size="0" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" padding_top="0px" padding_right="10%" padding_bottom="0px" padding_left="10%" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="0px" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" last="true" first="true"][fusion_tabs design="classic" layout="horizontal" justified="yes" bordercolor="rgba(235,234,234,0)" icon="fa-caret-right fas" icon_size="20" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility"][fusion_tab title=" " icon="fa-home fas"]

CR6000 Product Overview

The Code Reader™ 6000 (CR6000) is an industrial grade direct part mark (DPM) imager designed to read barcodes of every sort. The CR6000 effortlessly reads laser-etched, embossed, dot peen, low-contrast and postal barcodes, and easily decodes dense and extremely small barcodes. Designed with multiple illumination fields, the CR6000 intuitively selects the field that is most efficient at reading each barcode type. This results in quick and accurate data collection from hard-to-read surfaces, damaged barcodes, and those that are smudged, dirty or even caked with debris. This makes the CR6000 ideal for component tracking on assembly lines and other manufacturing applications.

How do our customers use the CR6000?

The CR6000 is made for manufacturing. We see this reader used a lot in automotive, heavy equipment, assembly lines, work-in-process, and more.

Ready to purchase Code barcode readers for your team? Our Code sales team is ready to point you to the best reseller to handle your needs.

[fusion_button link="/code-sales-team/" text_transform="" title="" target="_self" link_attributes="" alignment="" modal="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" color="default" button_gradient_top_color="" button_gradient_bottom_color="" button_gradient_top_color_hover="" button_gradient_bottom_color_hover="" accent_color="" accent_hover_color="" type="" bevel_color="" border_width="" size="" stretch="default" shape="" icon="" icon_position="left" icon_divider="no" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset=""]Talk to Sales[/fusion_button]

[/fusion_tab][fusion_tab title="Features" icon="fa-list-ul fas"]

CR6000 Features

  • Reads laser-etched and dot peen marks
  • Reads color and low-contrast barcodes
  • Reads 1D, 2D and postal barcodes
  • Wired via RS232 or USB connection
  • IP54 housing securely protects against dust and debris
  • Small form factor for operator comfort
  • Integrated metal clip or hook holder for ease of placement and retrieval
  • User feedback with programmable LED, audible tone and vibrating good read indicators
  • Operates hands-free or handled
  • Compatible with CortexTools® software configuration utility
  • Data editing and parsing with JavaScript
[/fusion_tab][fusion_tab title="Firmware" icon="fa-barcode fas"]

 

Firmware

Looking to customize your barcode reader’s function or its data parsing ability? Is it time for a firmware update? You have landed in the right place. Just click the link option below and you will be off and running.

These customizable options, features, and updates for your Code barcode scanners are a direct result of how our engineering team listens to the ideas and needs of our users have. If you don’t see an option that fits your scanning needs, we are more than happy to customize one for you. Let’s Talk!

[firmware product_id="13941"]
[/fusion_tab][fusion_tab title="Software" icon="fa-code fas"]

Software

Looking to customize your barcode reader’s function or its data parsing ability? Is it time for a firmware update? You have landed in the right place. Just click the link option below and you will be off and running.

These customizable options, features, and updates for your Code barcode scanners are a direct result of how our engineering team listens to the ideas and needs of our users have. If you don’t see an option that fits your scanning needs, we are more than happy to customize one for you. Let’s Talk!

[/fusion_text][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id=""]

[/fusion_text][fusion_separator style_type="none" top_margin="20" bottom_margin="20" sep_color="" border_size="" icon="" icon_circle="" icon_circle_color="" width="200px" alignment="" class="" id="" /][/fusion_builder_column][fusion_builder_column type="1_2" type="1_2" layout="1_2" last="false" spacing="yes" center_content="no" hide_on_mobile="no" background_color="" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="center center" hover_type="none" link="" border_position="all" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" padding_top="" padding_right="" padding_bottom="" padding_left="" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" class="" id="" min_height="" first="true"][fusion_youtube id="OiJhugR1WX4" alignment="center" width="500" height="400" autoplay="false" api_params="&rel=0" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" css_id="" /][/fusion_builder_column][fusion_builder_column type="1_2" type="1_2" layout="1_2" spacing="yes" center_content="no" link="" target="_self" min_height="" hide_on_mobile="no" class="" id="" background_image_id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" undefined="" background_repeat="no-repeat" hover_type="none" border_size="0" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" padding_top="" padding_right="15%" padding_bottom="" padding_left="15%" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" last="true" first="false"][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id=""]

CR6000 Industrial Grade

[/fusion_text][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id=""]

The CR6000 is the industrial grade scanner of choice for manufacturing workflows. It is an aggressive DPM reader that can read off of any surface, in any condition, and with any lighting.

[/fusion_text][fusion_separator style_type="none" top_margin="20" bottom_margin="20" sep_color="" border_size="" icon="" icon_circle="" icon_circle_color="" width="200px" alignment="" class="" id="" /][/fusion_builder_column][/fusion_builder_row][/fusion_builder_container][fusion_builder_container hundred_percent="no" hundred_percent_height="no" hundred_percent_height_scroll="no" hundred_percent_height_center_content="yes" equal_height_columns="no" menu_anchor="oem" hide_on_mobile="no" status="published" publish_date="" class="" id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" background_repeat="no-repeat" fade="no" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" video_mp4="" video_webm="" video_ogv="" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_loop="yes" video_mute="yes" video_preview_image="" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" padding_top="95px" padding_right="10%" padding_bottom="10px" padding_left="10%"][fusion_builder_row][fusion_builder_column type="1_3" type="1_3" layout="1_3" spacing="yes" center_content="no" link="" target="_self" min_height="" hide_on_mobile="no" class="" id="" background_image_id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" undefined="" background_repeat="no-repeat" hover_type="none" border_size="0" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" padding_top="" padding_right="" padding_bottom="" padding_left="15%" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" last="false" first="true"][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id=""]

Multiple Illumination Fields

[/fusion_text][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id=""]

The CR6000 is designed with multiple illumination fields. What does this mean? This reader can intuitively select the field that is most efficient at reading each barcode type. This feature is ideal in manufacturing processes where the lighting and conditions aren't predictable. This reader can read any barcode in any situation.

CR8200 Product Overview

The Code Reader™ 8200 (CR8200) is the next generation of Code’s patented, high performance, miniature barcode imaging engine. Innovative in its design, size and decode capability, the CR8200 delivers best-in-class high-performance 2D imaging that can be added to the smallest of devices. With rapid, first-pass read rates the CR8200 effortlessly decodes 1D, 2D, postal and direct part mark barcodes printed on a variety of surfaces in a variety of conditions. For integration versatility, choose the compact form factor that works best for your product design - imager with integrated decode board, or imager with software decoder that can be integrated into your existing processing platform.

How do our customers use our scan engines?

The CR8200 was made for OEM purposes. We see these engines used in medical devices, ATMs, price-lookup, lottery, age verification, direct part marking, handheld devices, mobile computers, and more. Ready to purchase Code barcode readers for your team? Our Code sales team is ready to point you to the best reseller to handle your needs. [fusion_button link="/code-sales-team/" text_transform="" title="" target="_self" link_attributes="" alignment="" modal="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" color="default" button_gradient_top_color="" button_gradient_bottom_color="" button_gradient_top_color_hover="" button_gradient_bottom_color_hover="" accent_color="" accent_hover_color="" type="" bevel_color="" border_width="" size="" stretch="default" shape="" icon="" icon_position="left" icon_divider="no" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset=""]Talk to Sales[/fusion_button]
[/fusion_tab][fusion_tab title="Features" icon="fa-list-ul fas"]

CR8200 Features

  • Ultra fast microprocessor with world-class decoding platform
  • Bright LED aiming mechanism
  • Imager Only or Imager with Decode Options
  • Extremely low power consumption for efficiency in battery applications
  • Fast boot to start reading right away
  • Compact size fits any application
  • Simple to setup and configure
[/fusion_tab][fusion_tab title="Firmware" icon="fa-barcode fas"]

Firmware

Looking to customize your barcode reader’s function or its data parsing ability? Is it time for a firmware update? You have landed in the right place. Just click the link option below and you will be off and running.

These customizable options, features, and updates for your Code barcode scanners are a direct result of how our engineering team listens to the ideas and needs our users have. If you don’t see an option that fits your scanning needs, we are more than happy to customize one for you. Let’s Talk!

[firmware product_id="13944"]
[/fusion_tab][fusion_tab title="Software" icon="fa-code fas"]

Software

These customizable options, features, and updates for your Code barcode scanners are a direct result of how our engineering team listens to the ideas and needs our users have. If you don’t see an option that fits your scanning needs, we are more than happy to customize one for you. Let’s Talk!

CR8200 Features

[/fusion_text][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id=""]

The CR8200 effortlessly decodes 1D, 2D, postal and direct part mark barcodes and its compact size will fit in any application. For battery operated devices, it features extremely low power consumption.

Kiosk Applications

[/fusion_text][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id=""] Self-checkout, mobile coupons, loyalty barcodes, ticket scanning.. These are just a few of the many kiosk applications that could are used in OEM workflows. Integrating a Code scan engine will increase efficiency in all of these areas and then some. [/fusion_text][/fusion_builder_column][fusion_builder_column type="1_3" layout="1_3" last="no" spacing="yes" center_content="no" hide_on_mobile="no" background_color="" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" background_position="left top" hover_type="none" link="" border_position="all" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="" padding_top="" padding_right="" padding_bottom="" padding_left="" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" class="" id="" min_height=""][fusion_image_before_after type="" before_image="https://www.codecorp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/CR8200-CUTOUT.png" before_image_id="15552|full" before_label="" after_image="https://www.codecorp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/CR8200-CUTOUT-back.png" after_image_id="15554|full" after_label="" font_size="" accent_color="" label_placement="" transition_time="" handle_type="" handle_color="" handle_bg="" offset="" orientation="" handle_movement="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset="" /][/fusion_builder_column][fusion_builder_column type="1_3" layout="1_3" spacing="yes" center_content="no" link="" target="_self" min_height="" hide_on_mobile="no" class="" id="" background_image_id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" undefined="" background_repeat="no-repeat" hover_type="none" border_size="0" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" padding_top="" padding_right="15%" padding_bottom="" padding_left="" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" last="no"][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id=""]

Automatic Scanning

[/fusion_text][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id=""] Code's engines read barcodes automatically and effortlessly. When a barcode is passed by the optical platform the engine will automatically pick up the motion and read the code. There is no reason to make sure the barcode is positioned just right or that there isn't a glare because these scan engines will read the barcode no matter what. item.title: CR7000 Battery Backup Case
item.dc:creator: LTBryant
item.content:encoded:
[fusion_builder_container hundred_percent="no" hundred_percent_height="no" hundred_percent_height_scroll="no" hundred_percent_height_center_content="yes" equal_height_columns="no" menu_anchor="" hide_on_mobile="no" status="published" publish_date="" class="" id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" background_repeat="no-repeat" fade="no" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" video_mp4="" video_webm="" video_ogv="" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_loop="yes" video_mute="yes" video_preview_image="" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="0px" padding_top="0px" padding_right="0px" padding_bottom="0px" padding_left="0px"][fusion_builder_row][fusion_builder_column type="1_1" type="1_1" layout="1_1" spacing="yes" center_content="no" link="" target="_self" min_height="" hide_on_mobile="no" class="" id="" background_image_id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" undefined="" background_repeat="no-repeat" hover_type="none" border_size="0" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" padding_top="0px" padding_right="10%" padding_bottom="0px" padding_left="10%" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="0px" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" last="true" first="true"][fusion_tabs design="classic" layout="horizontal" justified="yes" bordercolor="rgba(235,234,234,0)" icon="fa-caret-right fas" icon_size="20" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility"][fusion_tab title=" " icon="fa-home fas"]

CR7000 Series Product Overview

The CR7000 series healthcare grade battery backup cases are built for the mobile clinician. Like most healthcare facilities across the nation mobility is an increasingly important topic. Why? Well, the answer to that question is for two main reasons. The first would be the increased efficiency mobility offers point-of-care teams, and the second is the fact that mobility offers healthcare teams the opportunity to cut significant costs. Increased efficiency and saving money, is there a catch? Yes, a big one and it's called patient safety.

A mobile device used in a healthcare setting needs to be able to withstand the same harsh chemical disinfection protocol any other piece of medical equipment undergoes. Without some kind of case protection a naked phone wouldn't last six months depending on the severity of chemical baths. So where is the cost-cutting savings? It is delivered by protecting that mobile investment with the industry's first medical-grade, fully-enclosed battery backup case. These mobile pocket computers are positioned to replace expensive computer work stations and the all additional peripherials they require, including barcode scanning hardware. Everything can be charted, verified, scanned (using soft-scanning sofware and camera on that mobile device), re-verified, and documented all from a single mobile device running a mobile HIS or system.

If you are looking to mobilize your healthcare enterprise and deploy iPhone 7 or 8 devices the CR7000 cases are always PVC-free and built with CodeShield® disinfectant-ready plastics. The Dragontrail™ shatter-proof glass delivers the screen touch sensitivity you need while fully enclosing and protecting the smartphone from the bacteria and viruses trying to hitch a ride. Fully-enclosed means fully-protected unlike consumer-grade cases trying to fit this space. 

Code offers two product models in the CR7000 series to choose from. The CR7018 which features BatteryTrak™ and the CR7019 that offers data pass-through and single sign on capability. Both models offer easily swappable, external batteries that more than doubles the life of your phone and a flexible battery charging system that includes options like a 5 or 10-bay battery cradle that can be mounted horizontally or vertically to fit any workspace. These chargers provide a clear indication of each battery’s charge status eliminating the guess work on which battery to grab and get back to work.

CR7018 Product Highlights

  • BatteryTrak™ this mobile application shows you real-time battery vitals like deployment dates, state of health, and serial numbers. Start proactively managing your fleet of battery cases. Find it at the App Store
  • Two custom-built security cabinets from Datamation to charge multiple cases with batteries or drawer can be configured for batteries alone
  • Single drawer and double drawer cabinet configurations from Datamation provide flexibility for any
    workflow

CR7019 Product Highlights

  • Data pass-through via micro-USB cable
  • Two custom-built security cabinets from Datamation with charge and sync functionality to charge multiple cases with batteries or drawer can be configured for batteries alone
  • Accommodates tap-n-go and SSO workflows
  • Single drawer and double drawer cabinet configurations from Datamation provide flexibility for any workflow

How do our customers use the CR7000 series cases?

Insert the iPhone in the CR7000 and you’re on your way. Don’t swap cases to extend your battery life. With the CR7000 cases, you receive 24/7 protection to safeguard your investment. Your phone never has to leave its case to be charged because your iPhone battery never depletes. When the case battery runs low, quickly swap batteries and stay on the move. The CR7000 cases are perfect for the mobile clinician that wants to protect their mobile device and keep it running through their long shifts.

Ready to purchase Code barcode readers for your team or how about a free product demo? Our Code sales team is ready to point you to the best reseller to handle your needs or send your team a free demo so you can test it out for yourself!

Compatible with the iPhone 7 and 8, iOS investments will be protected with the CR7018. Built with CodeShield® PVC-Free disinfectant-ready plastics and a Dragontrail™ glass screen protector, cleaning is easy and efficient. Charging has never been easier with the quick swappable 2,700 mAh external battery and built-in fuel gauge. Simply swap out a depleted battery for a fully charged one.

The key to an effective clinical communication implementation is the constant availability of mobile devices. Dead batteries or broken mobile devices make this an impossibility. Achieve 24/7 runtime with the quick-swappable backup battery, and protect your iPhone with industry-leading durability to achieve uninterrupted mobile communication.

Mobile scanning become part of your workflow? No problem! CortexDecoder is a software scanning solution that is the perfect match for the CR7018. The camera-based scanning functionality, or soft-scanning, is built into the Epic Rover and Allscripts Sunrise mobile solutions. Don't want to integrate? The flexible CortexWedge is an iOS scanning keyboard that will enable scanning into any text-field or application without integration.

item.title: Code Corporation Competitive Advantages
item.dc:creator: LTBryant
item.content:encoded:
[fusion_builder_container hundred_percent="no" equal_height_columns="no" menu_anchor="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="center center" background_repeat="no-repeat" fade="no" background_parallax="none" parallax_speed="0.3" video_mp4="" video_webm="" video_ogv="" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_loop="yes" video_mute="yes" overlay_color="" video_preview_image="" border_size="" border_color="" border_style="solid" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" padding_left="" padding_right=""][fusion_builder_row][fusion_builder_column type="1_1" layout="1_1" background_position="left top" background_color="" border_size="" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" spacing="yes" background_image="" background_repeat="no-repeat" padding_top="" padding_right="" padding_bottom="" padding_left="" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="0px" class="" id="" animation_type="" animation_speed="0.3" animation_direction="left" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" center_content="no" last="no" min_height="" hover_type="none" link=""][fusion_text columns="" column_min_width="" column_spacing="" rule_style="default" rule_size="" rule_color="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id=""]   High Speed, Omnidirectional Barcode Reading: Code’s scanning software is the de facto choice for enterprise-grade barcode scanning technology that enables rapid, accurate decoding of virtually any barcode symbology, of virtually any quality and curvature – every time without fail.   Dual Field Optics: Code barcode readers are equipped with a patented dual-lens design that expands the reading range of the imager by providing two unique fields of view, a high-density field and a wide-angle field, in one device. This gives users a single device that will intuitively know which field should be used to read either a very wide barcode or a very small, dense barcode. Having these two optical fields in the same reader allows users to have the versatility needed to seamlessly change applications without changing barcode readers.   Glare Reduction: Code’s glare reducing technology makes reading barcodes on shiny surfaces, mobile devices, or curved surfaces, quick and easy. Barcodes printed on shiny surfaces can reflect both illumination and ambient light back into the barcode reader that can render the barcode unreadable. Code’s barcode readers are the only 2D area imagers in the industry that are equipped with a patented glare reduction technology that will significantly increase read rates in these environments.   Vibrating Motor on Good Reads: Code readers are equipped with up to three feedback indicators (LED, audible and vibration) to ensure the user is aware of a ‘good read’, regardless of the environment they are used in. Additionally, the audible good read indicator volume can be adjusted. Enable one, or all, depending on your work environment. Communication Modes: Code is an industry leader in integrating Bluetooth® technology with barcode reading. When paired with Code’s patented CodeXML® modem, Code readers will securely transmit encrypted data, via Bluetooth up to 30’ to a host computer, or system. For additional versatility, Code barcode readers can be paired with mobile devices powered by iOS, Android and Windows operating systems. The versatile interface between reader and mobile device is seamless and requires no need for modified or additional software. Innovative Design: The ergonomic and innovative design of Code barcode readers allows users to select the preferred hardware configuration that best suits their individual and unique use case without sacrificing barcode reading performance. From compact to palm and handled, tethered to wireless, Code has a barcode reading solution that will outperform in any environment. Out-of-Box Easy Setup: Code readers are designed to be plug and play. They can be shipped with a custom configuration designed specifically for your software interface needs. Switching between systems? Full configurations can be packed into a single barcode to make it easy to switch between applications. Durability: Code barcode readers are built to last and withstand the cleaning agents used in most industries, particularly healthcare where disinfecting products used in patient care is necessary to avoid cross contamination. For added durability Code readers features IP ratings up to 65 to protect the reader from dust and water ingress. Programmable Buttons: Code readers have multiple buttons on the upper surface of the unit that can be programmed for various tasks, such as simulated keystrokes, triggering the unit and more, making the device more versatile than other hand-held devices on the market today. Power Requirements: Most barcode readers are designed without power requirements of the reader, or the environment they will be used in, being a focus. The end user application and power management restrictions play an integral part of Code’s barcode reader designs.
  • Code cabled readers require extremely low power consumption, thus limiting the battery drain on devices — reducing overall costs when deployed throughout an operation.
  • Code wireless readers have replaceable battery cartridges that are long-life, allowing readers to be used for more than a complete shift at the highest use rate.
Replaceable, Rechargeable Battery Cartridges: Code's wireless readers feature replaceable, rechargeable battery cartridges that with the press of a button display battery life with four LED indicators. Replaceable, rechargeable battery cartridges allow you to swap out a depleted battery for a fully charged battery cartridge without having to take the reader out of service. Advanced Programming with JavaScript: Code barcode readers are masters of data collection. Each one is built upon a JavaScript platform—a user-friendly, computer programming language with interactive functionality. JavaScript allows users to quickly program data, then incorporate it into enterprise and proprietary solutions. Easy to integrate, easy to use—JavaScript provides the most straightforward data management tools available. Both beginner and experienced programmers prefer it due to its vast resources and ease of use. From intuitive interfaces to encryption, JavaScript creates limitless configurations. Manual or Automatic Triggering: Code cabled barcode readers seamlessly transition from in-stand to out-of-stand reading. The CR950, CR1100, and CR1500 features an auto-detect function that when placed into the stand automatically sets the reader into presentation mode. When in this mode, simply position a barcode under the LEDs to decode the barcode. When out of the stand, press the trigger. Paging Button: Code's charging stations with embedded modems feature a paging button to assist in locating misplaced readers. When pressed, the paging button signals the connected reader, the reader then beeps and vibrates until a button or trigger on the reader is pressed. [/fusion_text][/fusion_builder_column][/fusion_builder_row][/fusion_builder_container]

[...ready to head back to the product page]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: What are some of the amazing features that sets Code data capture solutions above the competition? I am glad you asked we made a list for you!

[fusion_builder_container hundred_percent="no" hundred_percent_height="no" hundred_percent_height_scroll="no" hundred_percent_height_center_content="yes" equal_height_columns="no" menu_anchor="" hide_on_mobile="no" status="published" publish_date="" class="" id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" background_repeat="no-repeat" fade="no" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" video_mp4="" video_webm="" video_ogv="" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_loop="yes" video_mute="yes" video_preview_image="" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="0px" padding_top="0px" padding_right="0px" padding_bottom="0px" padding_left="0px"][fusion_builder_row][fusion_builder_column type="1_1" type="1_1" layout="1_1" spacing="yes" center_content="no" link="" target="_self" min_height="" hide_on_mobile="no" class="" id="" background_image_id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" undefined="" background_repeat="no-repeat" hover_type="none" border_size="0" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" padding_top="0px" padding_right="15%" padding_bottom="0px" padding_left="15%" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="0px" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" last="true" first="true"][fusion_tabs design="classic" layout="horizontal" justified="yes" bordercolor="rgba(235,234,234,0)" icon="fa-caret-right fas" icon_size="20" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility"][fusion_tab title=" " icon="fa-home fas"]

Accessory Product Overview

We think as much about our accessories as our barcode scanning technology. Our mission is to make your job easier, no matter what it takes. We love to customize solutions to help you and your team work as efficiently as possible. Don't see an accessory listed below? Please reach out to your sales manager and see what we might have in the works.

Have additional questions on any of our accessories listed below? Our Code sales team is here to help.

[fusion_button link="/code-sales-team/" text_transform="" title="" target="_self" link_attributes="" alignment="" modal="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" color="default" button_gradient_top_color="" button_gradient_bottom_color="" button_gradient_top_color_hover="" button_gradient_bottom_color_hover="" accent_color="" accent_hover_color="" type="" bevel_color="" border_width="" size="" stretch="default" shape="" icon="" icon_position="left" icon_divider="no" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset=""]Talk to Sales[/fusion_button]

[/fusion_tab][fusion_tab title="Firmware" icon="fa-barcode fas"]

Firmware

Just in case you might be looking for software or firmware updates, you have landed in the right place. Just click the link option below and you will be off and running.

These customizable options, features, and updates for your Code barcode scanners are a direct result of how our engineering team listens to the ideas and needs of our users have. If you don’t see an option that fits your scanning needs, we are more than happy to customize one for you. Let’s Talk!

> Software/Firmware Downloads

[/fusion_tab][fusion_tab title="Software" icon="fa-code fas"]

These customizable options, features, and updates for your Code barcode scanners are a direct result of how our engineering team listens to the ideas and needs of our users have. If you don’t see an option that fits your scanning needs, we are more than happy to customize one for you. Let’s Talk!

> Software/Firmware Downloads

[/fusion_tab][fusion_tab title="Docs" icon="fa-file-pdf fas"]

[docset product_id="15170"]
Product Certifications
[/fusion_tab][/fusion_tabs][/fusion_builder_column][/fusion_builder_row][/fusion_builder_container][fusion_builder_container hundred_percent="no" hundred_percent_height="no" hundred_percent_height_scroll="no" hundred_percent_height_center_content="yes" equal_height_columns="no" menu_anchor="batteries" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" status="published" publish_date="" class="" id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="center center" background_repeat="no-repeat" fade="no" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" video_mp4="" video_webm="" video_ogv="" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_loop="yes" video_mute="yes" video_preview_image="" border_size="" border_color="" border_style="solid" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" padding_top="" padding_right="" padding_bottom="" padding_left=""][fusion_builder_row][fusion_builder_column type="1_1" type="1_1" layout="1_1" spacing="" center_content="no" link="" target="_self" min_height="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" background_image_id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" undefined="" background_repeat="no-repeat" hover_type="none" border_size="0" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" padding_top="" padding_right="15%" padding_bottom="" padding_left="15%" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset="" last="true" first="true"][fusion_title hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" content_align="center" size="2" font_size="" line_height="" letter_spacing="" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" text_color="" style_type="default" sep_color=""]

BATTERIES

[/fusion_title][/fusion_builder_column][fusion_builder_column type="1_1" type="1_1" layout="1_1" spacing="" center_content="no" link="" target="_self" min_height="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" background_image_id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" undefined="" background_repeat="no-repeat" hover_type="none" border_size="0" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" padding_top="" padding_right="15%" padding_bottom="" padding_left="15%" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset="" last="true" first="true"][fusion_accordion border_size="1" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility"][fusion_toggle title="Dark Gray Battery Cartridge (CRA-B4)" open="no"]

The dark gray (B4) battery cartridge is compatible with the CR2300, CR3600 and CR3600 DPM barcode readers.

Code barcode readers feature lithium-ion batteries. The batteries are long-life, allowing readers to be used for more than a complete shift at the highest use rate. Code’s modular design allows a user to quickly exchange a drained battery with a charged battery without taking a barcode reader out-of-service.

Battery cartridges features and benefits include:

  • ‘Quick release’ features allows batteries to be changed and still remain in service
  • Battery status LED indicators with fuel gauge to display battery life status
  • High read rate per charged battery

Charging options include:

  • The Charging Station with, or without, an embedded CodeXML® modem charges a B4 battery cartridge when engaged in a reader.
  • The Quad-Bay B4 Charging Station is designed to charge up to 4 B4 battery cartridges simultaneously.
[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="Light Gray Battery Cartridge (CRA-B5)" open="no"]

The light gray (B5) battery cartridge is compatible with the CR2600 (palm and handled) barcode reader.

Code barcode readers feature lithium-ion batteries. The batteries are long-life, allowing readers to be used for more than a complete shift at the highest use rate. Code’s modular design allows a user to quickly exchange a drained battery with a charged battery without taking a barcode reader out-of-service.

Battery cartridges features and benefits include:

  • ‘Quick release’ features allows batteries to be changed and still remain in service
  • Battery status LED indicators with fuel gauge to display battery life status
  • High read rate per charged battery

Charging options include:

  • The Charging Station with, or without, an embedded CodeXML® modem charges a B5 battery cartridge when engaged in a reader.
  • The Quad-Bay B5 Charging Station is designed to charge up to 4 B5 battery cartridges simultaneously.
[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="CR2700 Replacement Batteries (CRA-B27)" open="no"]

The B27 lithium-ion battery powers the CR2700 readers with a unique set of features that keep workflow interruptions to a minimum.  It has enough power to last up to 50,000 scans per charge.  It has a built-in power gauge that shows battery power status intuitively every time the reader is triggered to scan or the power gauge button is pressed.  A nurse will never need to guess whether the battery will last through her shift.   When the battery is running low, a quick-release latch allows easy swapping for a fully charged battery without the need to use any tools.  To proactively manage the life-cycle of the battery, the B27 accepts a custom date code to track deployment date or warranty service date that can be retrieved easily.  In addition, battery health information is available to device or asset managers to track residual battery capacity.

The B27 battery can be charged when installed in a CR2700 reader using the inductive charging station (CRA-A271) or in the quad-bay battery charger (CRA-A274).  It takes about 3.5-4 hours to fully charge a drained battery.

[/fusion_toggle][/fusion_accordion][/fusion_builder_column][/fusion_builder_row][/fusion_builder_container][fusion_builder_container hundred_percent="no" hundred_percent_height="no" hundred_percent_height_scroll="no" hundred_percent_height_center_content="yes" equal_height_columns="no" menu_anchor="cables" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" status="published" publish_date="" class="" id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="center center" background_repeat="no-repeat" fade="no" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" video_mp4="" video_webm="" video_ogv="" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_loop="yes" video_mute="yes" video_preview_image="" border_size="" border_color="" border_style="solid" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" padding_top="" padding_right="" padding_bottom="" padding_left=""][fusion_builder_row][fusion_builder_column type="1_1" type="1_1" layout="1_1" spacing="" center_content="no" link="" target="_self" min_height="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" background_image_id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" undefined="" background_repeat="no-repeat" hover_type="none" border_size="0" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" padding_top="" padding_right="15%" padding_bottom="" padding_left="15%" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset="" last="true" first="true"][fusion_title hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" content_align="center" size="2" font_size="" line_height="" letter_spacing="" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" text_color="" style_type="default" sep_color=""]

CABLES

[/fusion_title][/fusion_builder_column][fusion_builder_column type="1_1" type="1_1" layout="1_1" spacing="" center_content="no" link="" target="_self" min_height="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" background_image_id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" undefined="" background_repeat="no-repeat" hover_type="none" border_size="0" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" padding_top="" padding_right="15%" padding_bottom="" padding_left="15%" margin_top="" margin_bottom="" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset="" last="true" first="true"][fusion_accordion border_size="1" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility"][fusion_toggle title="12' Coiled RS232 Cable with RJ45 Connector for NCR Bioptic (CRA-C516) " open="no"]

Code SKU# CRA-C516

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="14' Coiled USB Affinity® Cable (CRA-C514) " open="no"]

The 8' Coiled USB Affinity® Cable is for use with cabled readers and the CR8000 Dev Kit.

Reader Termination: 10-pin RJ45
Host Termination: USB Type A plug

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="3' Straight USB Affinity® Cable (CRA-C507) " open="no"]

The 3' Straight USB Affinity® Cable is for use with Code's cabled barcode readers.

Reader Termination: 10-pin RJ45
Host Termination: USB Type A plug

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="3' Straight USB Charging Cable (CRA-C31) " open="no"]

The 3' Straight USB Charging Cable is for use with the CR2300, CR2600 and CR3600 Charging Stations.

Reader Termination: Mini-B USB
Host Termination: USB Type A plug

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title=" 3' USB Charging Cable for CR2500/CR3500 Charging Station (CRA-C5) " open="no"]

3' Straight USB Charging Cable for use with any CR2500/CR3500 charging station to charge the device.

Charger Termination: Barrel Jack
Host Termination: USB Type A plug

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="6' Straight Cable with Locking USB+ Power Connector (CRA-C510) " open="no"]

Code SKU# CRA-C510

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="6' Straight RS232 Affinity® Cable (CRA-C502) " open="no"]

The 6' Straight RS232 Affinity® Cable is for use with cabled readers and the CR8000 Dev Kit.

Code SKU# CRA-C502

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="6' Straight USB Affinity® Cable (CRA-C500) " open="no"]

The 6' Straight USB Affinity® Cable is for use with Code's cabled barcode readers.

Reader Termination: 10-pin RJ45
Host Termination: USB Type A plug

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="8' Coiled Cable with Locking USB+ Power Connector (CRA-C511) " open="no"]

Code SKU# CRA-C511

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="8' Coiled RS232 Affinity® Cable (CRA-C501) " open="no"]

The 8' Coiled RS232 Affinity® Cable is for use with Code's cabled barcode readers.

Reader Termination: 10-pin RJ45
Host Termination: 9-Pin, Female, D-Sub Connector

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title=" 8' Coiled RS232 Affinity® Cable with US Power Supply (CRA-C503) " open="no"]

The 8' Coiled RS232 Affinity®  Cable is for use with Code's cabled barcode readers.

Host Termination: 9-Pin, Female, D-Sub Connector

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="8' Coiled USB Affinity® Cable (CRA-C508) " open="no"]

The 8' Coiled USB Affinity® Cable is for use with Code's cabled barcode readers.

Reader Termination: 10-pin RJ45
Host Termination: USB Type A plug

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="9 Inch Straight USB Affinity® Cable (CRA-C509) " open="no"]

9" Straight USB Affinity Cable for use with Code's cabled barcode readers.

Reader Termination: 10-pin RJ45
Host Termination: USB Type A plug

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="3' USB Charge Cable (CRA-C34)" open="no"]

Code SKU# CRA-C34

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="RS232 Cable - 8 ft. Coiled (2.43 meters) (CR2AG-C1) " open="no"]

8' Coiled RS232 Cable with Power Jack for use with the CR2500, CR3500 and CodeXML® modems.

Reader Termination: 8-pin mini DIN

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="T500 Bluetooth Cable" open="yes"]

The t500 Cable enables tethered barcode readers to communicate wirelessly with virtually any mobile device (check out the video). Certified for use with the CR1000 and the CR5000 you can now work seamlessly on the mobile device you choose with Bluetooth connectivity. How does it work? Check out the article on our Tech Blog.

  • Wireless communication without unnecessary battery cost
  • Interfaces to virtually any mobile device
  • Brings presentation ready scanning to mobile POS
  • Compatible with a variety of Code readers
  • Simple Secure Pairing makes connection a snap
  • Low power consumption keeps energy costs down
  • Fully certified for use with iOS devices

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="CR2300 Palm Mountable Charger with Embedded Modem (CRA-A186) " open="no"]

The CR2300 Palm Mountable Charger is a versatile charger/modem option for mounting onto most vertical surfaces.

With a scan of the QuickConnect Code™, the CR2300, a Bluetooth® barcode reader, establishes a wireless connection to transmit barcoded data to a host device. Once a connection has been established, the paging button can be used to assist in locating a misplaced reader, should it be needed. With an LED charging status indicator, users always know the charge status. In addition, the charger positions the CR2300 to be in easy reach for retrieval.

The Mountable Charger has built-in, threaded mounting holes for easy installation.

The Bluetooth® word mark and logos are registered trademarks owned by Bluetooth SIG, Inc.

The CR2600 Palm Mountable Charger is a versatile charger/modem option for mounting onto medical carts, wall arms and most vertical surfaces.

With a scan of the QuickConnect Code™, the CR2600, a Bluetooth® barcode reader, establishes a wireless connection to transmit barcoded data to a host device. Once a connection has been established, the paging button can help clinicians locate the CR2600 should it be needed.

The Mountable Charger has built-in, threaded mounting holes for cart installation to firmly and reliably hold and charge the wireless palm CR2600 barcode reader. The Mountable Charger features an LED charging status indicator so clinicians know that the unit is being charged. In addition, the charger positions the CR2600 to be in easy reach for retrieval

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="T500 Cable CodeXML® Modems (T500)" open="no"]

No Ports? No Problem

Are you working with tablets or smart phones in your point of sale or enterprise application with no means of plugging in a barcode reader? Is your kiosk tablet-based, with limited ports? Are you working around these problems with expensive battery-powered, wireless scanners?

Code has a better solution: the T500 Cable. The T500 enables Code wired barcode readers to communicate to virtually any mobile device, including iPad®, Galaxy Tab, and Windows® Surface® along with other devices that lack the USB and RS232 ports found on legacy PC-based POS systems. And because the T500 draws power directly from a standard AC wall outlet, battery replacement is a non-factor.

Features & Benefits
  • Wireless communication without unnecessary battery cost
  • Interfaces to virtually any tablet
  • Brings presentation reading to mobile POS
  • Compatible with a variety of Code readers
  • Simple Secure Pairing makes connection a snap
  • Low power consumption keeps energy costs down
[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="CR2700 Bluethooth® Inductive Charging Station (CRA-A271)" open="no"]

The A271 Bluetooth Inductive Charging Station fulfills two main functionalities for the CR2700 readers.  First, it charges the battery in a CR2700 reader when the reader is placed in the charger, drawing power from a standard USB port on a host PC without the need for an external power supply.  Second, it acts as a bridge for wireless communication between a CR2700 reader and a PC host.  It features a sleek design that eliminates all exposed metal parts and associated contact failures caused by disinfectant use.  A touch capacitive paging button helps the user to locate a misplaced reader easily and abolishes the crevices around a mechanical button.  It now can withstand the harshest disinfectants commonly used at hospitals, making wiping down the device truly a breeze.  Its unique form factor is compatible with both the palm and handle CR2700 readers and with multiple mounting accessories, streamlining device management requirements and minimizing maintenance costs.  It is compatible with the CRA-C34 USB charging cable.

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="CR2700 Bluethooth® Dongle (CRA-BTDG27)" open="no" class="" id=""]

The Code Bluetooth Dongle provides for easy setup and reliable communication to a host PC while allowing the CR2700 to be charged in a separate location.  The Bluetooth Dongle can be paired with either the CR2700 Inductive Charger (CRA-A271) or the CR2700 Quad-Bay Battery Charger (CRA-A274) to complete the solution.  An example of this environment would be when readers or batteries are charged at a central location and the reader is carried from room to room.

READER STANDS AND MOUNTING BRACKETS

[/fusion_title][fusion_accordion border_size="1" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility"][fusion_toggle title="A111 Mountable Cart Charger Monitor Bracket Reader Stands & Mounting Brackets (CRA-MB1)" open="no"]

The Monitor Bracket provides easy docking and retrieval of a CR2600 when placed in the A111 Mountable Cart Charger. The Bracket is universally designed for installation on all cart chargers with monitors up to 22". The CRA-A111 Cart Charger and CR2600 are sold separately.

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="Charging Station Wall Mount Reader Stands & Mounting Brackets (CRA-WMB1)" open="no"]

The Wall Mount places a Charging Station within easy reach, without taking up valuable workstation space.  The

Wall Mount is compatible with CR2300, CR2600 and CR3600 Charging Stations.

Readers and Charging Stations are sold separately.

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="CR1000/CR1100, CR1400/CR1500 Dark Gray Stand Reader Stands & Mounting Brackets (CRA-US3)" open="no"]

The Universal Stand is a lightweight, durable and stable stand designed to comfortably hold a CR900/950 FD series, CR1000/1100 series, CR1000/1100 XHD series, CR1400/1500, or CR1400/1500 XHD.

Cabled readers feature an auto-detect function that when placed into the stand automatically sets the reader into a continuous scan mode. When in this mode, simply position a barcode under the LEDs to decode the barcode. When out of stand, press the trigger.

Stand Features Include:

  • Lightweight and sturdy base
  • Gooseneck post for adjusting the reader to the desired height and angle
  • Durable construction
  • Easy to unpack and assemble in under 1 minute
[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="CR6000 Stand Reader Stands & Mounting Brackets (CRA-US4)" open="no"]

The Universal Stand is a lightweight, durable and stable stand designed to comfortably hold a CR6000.

Cabled readers feature an auto-detect function that when placed into the stand automatically sets the reader into a continuous scan mode. When in this mode, simply position a barcode under the LEDs to decode the barcode. When out of stand, press the trigger.

Stand Features Include:

  • Lightweight and sturdy base
  • Gooseneck post for adjusting the reader to the desired height and angle
  • Durable construction
  • Easy to unpack and assemble in under 1 minute
[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="CR950 Stand Reader Stands & Mounting Brackets (CRA-US9)" open="no"]

The US9 is a lightweight stand designed to hold a CR950 snuggly.

The CR950 has a built-in stand detection feature that automatically switches the scanner to the hands-free presentation scanning mode without the need to change the configuration manually. When in this mode, the CR950 automatically detects and scans the barcode presented to its field of view, freeing up both hands to make checkout a fun and efficient experience.

Stand Features Include:

  • Lightweight and durable
  • Small footprint ideal for tight spaces
  • Adjustable cup angle for comfortable operation
  • Fix mountable with included screw holes
  • Easy to assemble
[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="Scanner Wall Mount Bracket Reader Stands & Mounting Brackets (CRA-WMB3)" open="no"]

The wall bracket provides a simple solution to mount Code's tethered scanners. It features durable metal construction with powder coating in light gray. Built-in slots allow easy installation onto various surfaces. Compatible with the CR950, CR1100, CR1400, and CR1500.

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="Universal Stand - CR1000, CR1400 (CRA-US2)Reader Stands & Mounting Brackets" open="no"]

The Universal Stand is a lightweight, durable and stable stand designed to comfortably hold a CR1100 or CR1500 presentation style barcode reading.

Stand Features Include:

  • Lightweight and sturdy base
  • Gooseneck post for adjusting the reader to the desired height and angle
  • Modular design allows for a product-specific holder to be mounted at the top of the gooseneck
  • Durable, plastic construction
  • Easy to unpack and assemble in under 1 minute
[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="CR7018 Vertical Battery Mount (CRA-VM718)" open="no"]

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="Wall Mount (CRA-WMB4)" open="no"]

The CRA-WMB4 is a compact wall mount bracket compatible with the CRA-A271 charger.  It is made with powder coated metal for sturdiness and durability.  It can be easily fixed mounted onto a wall using standard screws (supplied by users).  It ships with two pan-head screws for mounting the charger.  Optional thumb screws (CRA-CR27-01) can also be used in place of the pan-head screws and are available from Code.

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="CR2700 Desktop Base (CRA-MB6)" open="no"]

The CRA-MB6 provides a sturdy base for the CRA-A271 charging station.  It includes preinstalled anti-skid rubber feet.  It ships with two pan-head screws to attach the base to the charging station.  For a semi-fixed installation, the base can be mounted to a flat surface using the included adhesive tape.

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="VESA Mount (CRA-MB7)" open="no"]

The CRA-MB7 is designed to mount the CRA-A271 charging station onto standard VESA Monitor mounts commonly found on medical carts used in hospitals.  It is compatible with flat screen monitors up to 27” in size and can be placed on either the left or right side of the monitor.  It is made with powder coated sheet metal for strength and durability.  It ships with two pan-head screws for mounting the charger.  Optional thumb screws (CRA-CR27-01) can also be used in place of the pan-head screws and are available from Code.

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="VESA Mount Adapter (CRA-MB8)" open="no"]

 

The CRA-MB8 bracket is a conversion plate for any customers that have the CR2600 charger mounted to our wall-mount bracket (CRA-WMB1). With this bracket, they can use the CR2700 charger (CRA-A270 or CRA-A271) with the CRA-WMB1 originally intended for a CR2600. Without having to change all your mounting equipment as you upgrade from the CR2600 to the new and improved 2700, this bracket takes advantage of equipment you already have. With the bracket installed and in use your new 2700 will be able to be wall mounted and can even scan while in the charger.  It is compatible with flat-screen monitors up to 27” in size and can be placed on either the left or right side of the monitor.  It is made with powder-coated sheet metal for strength and durability.  It ships with 2 flat-head screws for mounting.

SOFTWARE

[/fusion_title][fusion_accordion border_size="1" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility"][fusion_toggle title="Code Development Kits (SDK) " open="no"]

Code development kits provide all the documentation and tools developers need to develop custom applications for Code hardware and software

JavaScript Application Development Kit

JavaScript is recognized as the leading procedural language for cross-platform development. JavaScript is used to develop interaction with the user, control the logic of input processing, display messages to the user, perform look-up and other validation functions, and control the interaction with a remote host either through cabled or radio frequency (Bluetooth) communications. Applications are developed without the overhead and porting problems inherent with Windows Pocket PC and CE.NET

The JavaScript development environment includes a Windows PC Based simulator for development and testing of applications. A unique feature of the Code development environment is Applications Developers may control the distribution of their applications by using a developers key which will be required to run the application on a given reader, controlled by serial number.

The Javascript Application Development Kit is a free download. To enable applications, you must purchase runtime keys from Code. Please contact Code Technical Support for more information.

C++ Development Kit

 

The C++ Development Kit is utilized by experienced developers who wish to develop more advanced configurations and applications for Code readers. The full installation contains all of the sample scripts and documentation for development using C++.

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="CodeXML® Embedded JavaScript® Rule Runner® License (XML-ER1) " open="no"]

The JavaScript® Rule Runner® license enables rules to be defined and securely loaded on the barcode reader to direct the formatting and processing of the decoded data as well as routing of the data to one or more destinations.

REMOTE MANAGEMENT

[/fusion_title][fusion_accordion border_size="1" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility"][fusion_toggle title="CortexRM® (cortexrm)" open="no"]

CortexRM®

CortexRM™ is a remote management tool designed to give the IT department the ability to manage a fleet of Code barcode readers from a single location, by using the same tool, or tools, already being used to manage other hardware devices deployed across an enterprise. CortexRM™ gives instant visibility and control of a barcode reader, no matter where it is located or how it is connected.

CortexRM™ Features and Benefits:

  • Upgrade barcode reader firmware across your entire enterprise on your schedule
  • CortexRM™ is designed to work with your remote management software used to manage additional equipment in your facility
  • Check the battery life, serial numbers, firmware version and more
  • Send configuration files to enable or disable features
  • CortexRM™ works with either Bluetooth® or tethered Code readers
  • Compatible with Windows® 7 or Windows® XP operating systems

[/fusion_text][fusion_accordion border_size="1" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility"][fusion_toggle title="1950mAH Li-Ion Battery Cartridge (CR2AG-B2)" open="no"]

Code barcode readers feature lithium ion batteries. The batteries are long-life, allowing readers to be used for more than a complete shift at the highest use rate. Code's modular design allows a user to quickly exchange a drained battery with a charged battery without taking a barcode reader out-of-service.

Batteries are available in cartridge and handle formats.

Battery cartridges features and benefits include:

  • 'Quick release' features allows batteries to be changed and still remain in service
  • High read rate per charged battery
  • Available in 1950mAH
  • Battery blank cartridge available for cabled readers
[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="3.5' Straight USB Cable" open="no"]

3.5' Straight USB Cable for use with the CR2500, CR3500 and CodeXML® modems.

Reader Termination: 8-pin mini DIN
Host Termination: USB Type A plug

View our complete list of available cables >>

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="Age Verification Download Kit (CRA-AVDK1)" open="no"]

The Age Verification Download Kit includes a USB Cable, Battery Blank, Allen Wrench, 2 Screws and instructions.

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="Battery Blank Cartridge (CR2AG-B0)" open="no"]

Blank battery cartridges are available for users who prefer to use the CR2500 and CR3500 in a palm, cabled format. Handles are also available for cabled users

[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="Battery Handle Charger (CR2AG-A11)" open="no"]

Code’s Battery Handle Charger gives users a desk or wall mounted charging options for Code's Battery Handles.

Features & Benefits:

  • Desk or wall mount option
  • Charge via AC power adapter or USB charging cable
  • a CodeXML Modem housing compartment (modem not included)
  • BH1 charging time approximately 3 hours
  • BH2 charging time approximately 6 hours
  • Compatible with CR2 and CR3 barcode readers (readers and handles not included)
  • Dimensions: 9.125” L x 3.4” W x 2” H
  • Weight: 4.8 oz (136 g)
[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="Battery Handle w/1950mAH Li-Ion Battery (CR2AG-BH1)" open="no"]

Code’s Battery Handle offers an enhanced level of rugged, cordless mobility for high volume barcode reading environments. The Battery Handle comes with either a 1950 mAh (BH1), 3900 mAh (BH2) lithium ion battery system, or a 1950 mAh (BH3)

Features & Benefit:

  • Compatible with CR2500 and CR3500 barcode readers
  • Extended trigger life: three million activations
  • Threaded screw attachment option to secure reader to handle
  • Reader has ‘quick release’ connection to handle
  • Durable over-molded housing improves drop-shock survivability
  • Enhanced protection to reader window and illumination LEDs
  • Charge battery handles with UMC, Battery Handle Charger, or Cable
  • BH1/BH2/BH3 Dimensions: 5.5” H x 4” L x 2” W
  • Weight: BH1/BH3: 4.8 oz (136 g) BH2: 6.4 oz (181 g)
[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="Battery Handle w/3900mAH Li-Ion Battery (CR2AG-BH2)" open="no"]

Code’s Battery Handle offers an enhanced level of rugged, cordless mobility for high volume barcode reading environments. The Battery Handle comes with either a 1950 mAh (BH1), 3900 mAh (BH2) lithium ion battery system, or a 1950 mAh (BH3).

Features & Benefits:

  • Compatible with the CR2500 and CR3500 barcode readers
  • Extended trigger life: three million activations
  • Threaded screw attachment option to secure reader to handle
  • Reader has ‘quick release’ connection to handle
  • Durable over-molded housing improves drop-shock survivability
  • Enhanced protection to reader window and illumination LEDs
  • Charge battery handles with UMC, Battery Handle Charger, or Cable
  • BH1/BH2/BH3 Dimensions: 5.5” H x 4” L x 2” W
  • Weight: BH1/BH3: 4.8 oz (136 g) BH2: 6.4 oz (181 g)
[/fusion_toggle][fusion_toggle title="Code Reader™ 2500 Protective Elastomer Boot" open="no"]

An elastomer shock-absorbing boot is available for the CR2500.

The boot features:

  • a non-slip rubber, ideal for preventing the reader from sliding off a surface
  • Slides easily over the CR2500 wireless or cabled reader
  • Can be cleaned with isopropyl alcohol, Clorox disinfecting wipes and medical DiAirKem

item.dc:creator: LTBryant
item.content:encoded:
[fusion_builder_container hundred_percent="no" hundred_percent_height="no" hundred_percent_height_scroll="no" hundred_percent_height_center_content="yes" equal_height_columns="no" menu_anchor="" hide_on_mobile="no" status="published" publish_date="" class="" id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" background_repeat="no-repeat" fade="no" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" video_mp4="" video_webm="" video_ogv="" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_loop="yes" video_mute="yes" video_preview_image="" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="0px" padding_top="0px" padding_right="0px" padding_bottom="0px" padding_left="0px"][fusion_builder_row][fusion_builder_column type="1_1" type="1_1" layout="1_1" spacing="yes" center_content="no" link="" target="_self" min_height="" hide_on_mobile="no" class="" id="" background_image_id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" undefined="" background_repeat="no-repeat" hover_type="none" border_size="0" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" padding_top="0px" padding_right="10%" padding_bottom="0px" padding_left="10%" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="0px" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" last="true" first="true"][fusion_tabs design="classic" layout="horizontal" justified="yes" bordercolor="rgba(235,234,234,0)" icon="fa-caret-right fas" icon_size="20" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility"][fusion_tab title=" " icon="fa-home fas"]

GoCode® Secure Barcode Symbology

GoCode is a miniature, two-dimensional (2-D) symbol. Developed to fit within a line of text, GoCode features a multi-dimensional, adaptable matrix pattern that may be reproduced on virtually any surface. Companies may utilize GoCode as their own proprietary mark. It has many significant advantages over all common linear barcodes and 2-D symbols:

Security - While the implementation of public barcode standards greatly benefits worldwide supply chain operations, it's estimated that between 5 - 7 % of all world trade is in counterfeit goods, amounting to an annual value exceeding $250 billion. In the pharmaceutical industry alone, the World Health Organization reports a loss of $10 billion per year. Public domain barcodes have been widely adopted as a cost-effective and efficient way to identify products and streamline the global supply chain but, criminals who counterfeit, pirate and divert products are keenly aware of this and go to great lengths to replicate barcodes as a way to get their fraudulent goods into the marketplace. GoCode is a proprietary symbol and is utilized by companies that benefit from having their own private barcode. GoCode cannot be decoded or copied and is a perfect solution for counterfeiting problems or for applications requiring advanced security. GoCode may also be created with user authentication features so critical or sensitive data may only be read by approved readers.

Readability - GoCode outperformed all other 2-D symbols in USAF conducted harsh environment testing. The multi-resolution matrix allows for critical data to be retrieved even from the most damaged symbols. GoCode also uses sophisticated error correction algorithms to keep intact 100% of the data, even if more than half of the symbol is damaged.

Size - GoCode® uses a proprietary, ultra efficient data compression technology that enables it to be the only 2-D symbol that can operate within the space constraints of common text. Developed for use in print media, GoCode® may be optimized for 100% readability at extremely small sizes.

Density - If your application has size restraints, GoCode® is the most customizable symbol and will hold more data at small sizes than any 2-D symbol.

How do our customers use GoCode Secure Barcodes?

Our customers use GoCode when their data-capture needs require a level of security and protection. A perfect solution for counterfeiting problems or for applications requiring advanced security. GoCode® may also be created with user authentication features so critical or sensitive data may only be read by approved readers. One example is in vendor credentialing process for healthcare environments.

Ready to start using GoCode for your secure data-capture needs? Our Code sales team is ready to point you to the best reseller to handle your needs.

item.dc:creator: LTBryant
item.content:encoded:
[fusion_builder_container hundred_percent="no" hundred_percent_height="no" hundred_percent_height_scroll="no" hundred_percent_height_center_content="yes" equal_height_columns="no" menu_anchor="" hide_on_mobile="no" status="published" publish_date="" class="" id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" background_repeat="no-repeat" fade="no" background_parallax="none" enable_mobile="no" parallax_speed="0.3" video_mp4="" video_webm="" video_ogv="" video_url="" video_aspect_ratio="16:9" video_loop="yes" video_mute="yes" video_preview_image="" border_size="0px" border_color="" border_style="solid" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="0px" padding_top="0px" padding_right="0px" padding_bottom="0px" padding_left="0px"][fusion_builder_row][fusion_builder_column type="1_1" layout="1_1" spacing="yes" center_content="no" link="" target="_self" min_height="" hide_on_mobile="no" class="" id="" background_image_id="" background_color="" background_image="" background_position="left top" undefined="" background_repeat="no-repeat" hover_type="none" border_size="0" border_color="" border_style="solid" border_position="all" padding_top="0px" padding_right="10%" padding_bottom="0px" padding_left="10%" margin_top="0px" margin_bottom="0px" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.1" animation_offset="" last="no"][fusion_tabs design="classic" layout="horizontal" justified="yes" backgroundcolor="" inactivecolor="" bordercolor="rgba(235,234,234,0)" icon="fa-caret-right fas" icon_position="" icon_size="20" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id=""][fusion_tab title="Overview" icon=""]

CR8000 Product Overview

The Code Reader™ 8000 (CR8000) This product has been discontinued and replaced by the CR8200. If you have any questions please contact us for support. This patented, high performance, miniature barcode imaging engine. The CR8000 continues Code's legacy of dual optical fields - while most devices have a single field enhanced for a specific application, the CR8000 has both a high-density field for reading the smallest of barcodes and a wide angle field for reading oversized barcodes giving you two readers in one.

How do our customers use our scan engines?

The CR8000 was made for OEM purposes. We see these engines used in medical devices, ATMs, price-lookup, lottery, age verification, direct part marking, handheld devices, mobile computers, and more. Ready to purchase Code barcode readers for your team? Our Code sales team is ready to point you to the best reseller to handle your needs. [fusion_button link="/code-sales-team/" text_transform="" title="" target="_self" link_attributes="" alignment="" modal="" hide_on_mobile="small-visibility,medium-visibility,large-visibility" class="" id="" color="default" button_gradient_top_color="" button_gradient_bottom_color="" button_gradient_top_color_hover="" button_gradient_bottom_color_hover="" accent_color="" accent_hover_color="" type="" bevel_color="" border_width="" size="" stretch="default" shape="" icon="" icon_position="left" icon_divider="no" animation_type="" animation_direction="left" animation_speed="0.3" animation_offset=""]Talk to Sales[/fusion_button]
[/fusion_tab][fusion_tab title="Features" icon=""]

CR8000 Features

  • Dual field optics, both high density and wide field in the same reader
  • World-class decoding platform
  • Glare reduction technology
  • Attachable illumination blocks for different applications
  • Bright LED aiming mechanism
  • Compact size fits any application
  • Simple to setup and configure
  • Data editing and parsing with JavaScript
  • Reads barcodes reliably off cell phone screens
  • Compatible with Code’s CortexTools® software configuration utility
  • Free Software Developer's Kit
  • Built in TTL RS232 or USB interface
[/fusion_tab][fusion_tab title="Software/Firmware" icon="fa-qrcode fas"]

Software and Firmware

Looking to customize your barcode reader’s function or its data parsing ability? Is it time for a firmware update? You have landed in the right place. Just click the link option below and you will be off and running.

These customizable options, features, and updates for your Code barcode scanners are a direct result of how our engineering team listens to the ideas and needs our users have. If you don’t see an option that fits your scanning needs, we are more than happy to customize one for you. Let’s Talk!

> Configuration Guide Generator

> Software/Firmware Downloads

[/fusion_tab][fusion_tab title="Documentation" icon="fa-file-pdf fas"]

Datasheets, Manuals & Guides

CR1400 Product Overview

The Code Reader™ 1400 (CR1400) The Code Reader™ 1400 (CR1400) is a compact, rugged, that is now discontinued. This tethered barcode reader has been replaced by the CR1500 that also features a high-performance scan engine, patented dual-field optical platform and intuitive targeting that makes reading 1D, 2D and postal barcodes extremely fast and reliable. Built for either healthcare or industrial purposes, this reader is ready to thrive in either demanding setting. If you have any questions please contact us for support.
[/fusion_tab][fusion_tab title="Software/Firmware" icon="fa-qrcode fas"]

Software and Firmware

Looking to customize your barcode reader’s function or its data parsing ability? Is it time for a firmware update? You have landed in the right place. Just click the link option below and you will be off and running.

These customizable options, features, and updates for your Code barcode scanners are a direct result of how our engineering team listens to the ideas and needs our users have. If you don’t see an option that fits your scanning needs, we are more than happy to customize one for you. Let’s Talk!

> Configuration Guide Generator

> Software/Firmware Downloads

CR3600 Product Overview

The Code Reader™ 3600 (CR3600)

The Code Reader™ 3600 (CR3600) is currenlty discontinued. Featuring Direct Part Mark (DPM) reading capabilities the CR6000 or CR1100 are great replacements packing numerous features into their compact designs. If you have any questions please contact us for support.
